src:
Pretend your phone's screen is cracked with this wallpaper
01 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Rusty Blazenhoff
When one man's screen cracked, our pal Doctor Popular saw an opportunity:
After a cat knocked knocked over his tv, Timothy Ryan Mulroney took a photo of the cracked screen and shared it on the Glitch Artists Collective on Facebook.I thought it would make a great iPhone wallpaper… so I made it into one. You can download it here.

Fun!


Broken LCD screen mobile wallpaper
